hero.text: Clock allows you to easily edit your timesheets on your mobile device or PC.

blurb1.title: Start-and-Go! Just do your work.
blurb1.text: Simply start your shift with the clock button and close your browser. You can clock out on any device later if your work is done.

blurb2.title: Did your forgot to clock? No problem!
blurb2.text: Past shifts can easily be added. All shifts can be edited or even deleted - you decide which shifts will be printed on your timesheet!

logout.message: You can come back later at any time.
logout.title: Are you sure you want to logout?

setupData.title: Your first steps

underConstruction.text: We are continuously exploring new functionality for Clock and value your feedback. Do not hesitate to contact us.
underConstruction.title: Under construction

welcome.text: You are new here, huh? We need to get a few things done, before you can start using Clock. We will guide you through the process!
welcome.title: @:app.onboarding

1.title: What is Clock?
1.text: Clock is an online tool to help you register your working time and generate your monthly timesheets. You control all of your data and you decide when your timesheet is ready to be turned in.

2.title: Contracts
2.text: A Contract is a virtual duplicate of your real contract and should have the same duration and the same number of work hours. If you have more than one job, you can create additional Contracts and clock your working time separately.

3.title: Shifts
3.text: A consecutive working time is called 'Shift'. You can clock Shifts directly in real time on the Dashboard or you can add them manually and schedule Shifts in advance. A scheduled Shift must be reviewed when it is done.

4.title: The Dashboard
4.text: The Clock Dashboard features the 'Clock in' button and displays useful information about your Shifts and working time. You will receive a warning if your Shifts overlap or if you forgot to clock out.

5.title: Calendar and Shift Table
5.text: You can view and edit all your past and future Shifts either in the Calendar view or in the Shift Table. The Shift Table also displays additional information about your Shifts like Notes and Tags.

6.title: Generate a timesheet
6.text: At the end of a month, you can generate a timesheet with all Shifts summed up for every day of the current month. You can download your timesheet and turn it in at your supervisor's office.

7.title: Legally safe
7.text: Clock warns you if your working times conflict with rules and legal regulations. If you have trouble solving any conflicts with your supervisor, you may use our contact form to reach the ombudsperson for student affairs.

personnelNumber.noPersonnelNumberSaved: To create a timesheet, you need to enter your personnel number. If you do not know the number yet, you can add it later before downloading your first timesheet.
personnelNumber.personnelNumberSaved: You alreadey saved your personnel number
personnelNumber.title: Save personnel number
personnelNumber.hint: You can find your personnel number on your salary printout.
personnelNumber.label: Personnel number
personnelNumber.changeInfo: Your personnel number is independent of your contract(s) and should not change.
personnelNumber.changeConfirmText: Are you sure you want to change your personnel number?

privacyagreement.text: You need to accept the {privacyAgreement} before using Clock.
privacyagreement.checkbox: I have read and agree with the privacy policy.
privacyagreement.revokeInfo: The agreement can be revoked by deleting your account.

reports.exportAlert: Once you generate the timesheet, you will not be able to add or update shifts in the corresponding month

hints.request: You can request and subsequently download your timesheet for review. You cannot request a timesheet for the current month before locking the previous month of the same contract.
hints.personnelnumber: You will also have to supply your personnel number.
hints.lock: You can only lock the month after generating the timesheet for review.

lock.label: Lock this month
lock.message: After locking this month, you will not be able to edit its shifts. The locking of a month cannot be undone.

warnings.maxOvertimeExceeded: You gathered more than 50% of your debit working time in overtime. Only 50% of you debit working time will be carried over to the next month as surplus hours.
warnings.insufficientWorktime: You are missing more than 20% of your debit working time.
warnings.worktimeOverEightyHours: Your total working time for this month is greater than 80h. Please keep in mind that you lose your students insurance status if you work more than 80h during the semester.

reports.monthlyReminder: Please remember to export your timesheets for the previous month!

selectContract.hint: Change the contract to see different data.
selectContract.hintExpired: This contract has expired. Change the contract to see different data.

account.dialogText: Please enter your email address {email} to confirm.
account.text: You can delete you account at any time. This will purge all the data we keep on record for you. Please remember that this action is permanent and not reversible! You can create a new account afterwards.

language.text: Changing the language will take effect immediately.

shifts.reviewErrorPast: A past shift must be reviewed before saving.
shifts.reviewErrorFuture: A future shift cannot be saved as 'reviewed'.
shifts.reviewErrorLive: A running shift can not be reviewed before its end.

table.pastShiftsHint: Clocked shifts and manually entered shifts are considered as 'reviewed' if they are past.

errors.startedBeforeStopped: The start must be before the end of the shift.
errors.maximumWorktimePerDay: The maxium allowed working time amount is 10 hours per day.
errors.workingOnSundays: It is not allowed to work on a sunday.
errors.workingOnHolidays: You can only book 'holiday' shifts on a holiday.
errors.exclusiveVacation: You can not combine 'vacation' shifts with other shifts on the same day.
errors.exclusiveSick: You can not combine 'sick' shifts with other shifts on the same day.
errors.overlappingStarted: The start time is within the period of an existing and reviewed shift.
errors.overlappingStopped: The end time is within the period of an already existing and reviewed shift.
errors.eightTwentyRule: As a rule, student workers should not be obliged to work before 08:00 and after 20:00.
errors.autoWorktimeCutting: Mandatory breaktimes are missing on this workday. Clock will subtract the legally required breaktimes automatically from your working time.
errors.month_already_locked: This month has already been locked. You cannot save new shifts within this month.
